data.caption: Disclosure On Related Party Transaction Pursuant To Regulation 23(9) Of SEBI (Listing Obligations & Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we submit herewith the requisite disclosure on Related Party Transactions of the Company for the half year ended on 30th September, 2022, in accordance with the applicable accounting standards.

data.caption: Standalone & Consolidated Quarterly Unaudited Financial Results (Provisional) For The Quarter/ Half Year Ended 30Th September, 2022
data.news_body:
Please find enclosed herewith the following:-
1. A copy of Standalone & Consolidated Quarterly Unaudited Financial Results (Provisional) for the quarter/ half year ended 30th September, 2022 as approved by the Board of Directors in their meeting held today.
2. Limited Review Reports dated 05th November, 2022 of the Statutory Auditors for the quarter/ half year ended 30th September, 2022 for the Standalone & Consolidated Results.
3. A copy of the Extract of the Quarterly Unaudited Financial Results (Provisional) for the quarter/ half year ended 30th September, 2022 to be published in the newspaper.

Further, we are pleased to inform that as per the Press Release dated 03/11/2022 of the National Stock Exchange (NSE), they are Listing the Equity Shares of our Company on their Stock Exchange w.e.f. 07/11/2022.

data.caption: Standalone & Consolidated Quarterly Unaudited Financial Results (Provisional) For The Quarter Ended 30Th June, 2022
data.news_body:
Please find enclosed herewith the following:-
1. A copy of Standalone & Consolidated Quarterly Unaudited Financial Results (Provisional) for the quarter ended 30th June, 2022 as approved by the Board of Directors in their meeting held today.
2. Limited Review Reports dated 13th August, 2022 of the Statutory Auditors for the quarter ended 30th June, 2022 both for Standalone & Consolidated Results.
3. A copy of the Extract of the Quarterly Unaudited Financial Results (Provisional) for the quarter ended 30th June, 2022 to be published in the newspaper.

Further, the Board of Directors has approved that the Company do apply for the Listing of its Equity Shares on the National Stock Exchange (NSE).

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held Of Date
data.news_body:
Please find enclosed herewith the following:-
1. A copy of Standalone & Consolidated Quarterly Unaudited Financial Results (Provisional) for the quarter ended 30th June, 2022 as approved by the Board of Directors in their meeting held today.
2. Limited Review Reports dated 13th August, 2022 of the Statutory Auditors for the quarter ended 30th June, 2022 both for Standalone & Consolidated Results.
3. A copy of the Extract of the Quarterly Unaudited Financial Results (Provisional) for the quarter ended 30th June, 2022 to be published in the newspaper.
Further, the Board of Directors has approved that the Company do apply for the Listing of its Equity Shares on the National Stock Exchange (NSE).

data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we submit herewith the requisite disclosure on Related Party Transactions of the Company for the half year ended on 31st March, 2022, in accordance with the applicable accounting standards.

data.caption: Audited Financial Results  (Standalone And Consolidated) Of The Company For The Quarter/Year Ended 31St March, 2022
data.news_body:
1. The Board has approved the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter/year ended 31st March, 2022.
2. The Company has paid Interim Dividend @ 100% i.e. Rs. 10/- per equity share of face value of Rs. 10/- each in February, 2022, the Board has considered the same as the dividend for the financial year 2021-22.
3. The Board has approved the re-appointment of M/s. Dinesh Gupta & Company, Practicing Company Secretaries, Jalandhar as Secretarial Auditors of the Company.
4. The Board has approved the re-appointment of M/s Kushwinder Kumar & Associates, Cost Accountants as Cost Auditors to conduct Cost Audit of the Company

data.caption: Submission Of Disclosure On Related Party Transaction Pursuant To Regulation 23(9) Of SEBI (Listing Obligations & Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we submit herewith the requisite disclosure on Related Party Transactions of the Company for the year ended on 31st March, 2021, in accordance with the applicable accounting standards.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held Of Date
data.news_body:
a) Approved the Audited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended 31st March, 2021.
b) Approved the audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Statements of the Company for the year ended 31st March, 2021.
c) Recommended Final dividend @ 30% amounting Rs. 3/- per equity share on basis of face value of Re. 10/- each, for the FY 2020-2021.
d) The 77th Annual General Meeting of the members of the Company is scheduled to be held on Friday, the 6th day of August, 2021 at Phagwara.
e) Book closure for the purpose of AGM will be from 30.07.2021 to 06.08.2021 (both days inclusive).
f) The Board accepted the resignation submitted by Smt. Ruby Agrawal, one of our Independent Directors.
g) The Board co-opted Sh. S S Hothi (DIN:09182046), the former Air Vice Marshal at Indian Air Force & a corporate trainer, as an Independent Additional Director of the Company till the conclusion of the ensuing Annual General Meeting.
h) Re-constitution of Board Committees
